title: Silca’s Drone Powered Ellectrico Air Pump Comes in Two Sizes
content:
Silca‘s drone motor-powered Ellectrico air pumps are back in stock, in both the Ultimate ($159) and Micro ($129) sizes…

Back at the height of the tariffs ordeal, Silca had to postpone the launch of its Ellectrico air pump to the US market. Now with tariffs reduced, Silca has brought in more. Due to the uncertainty of tariffs, Silca does not know if this price will hold and even more so, they do not know for certain if Silca will ever get more in stock here.

Ellectrico Quick Hits

  • Ultimate has a range of 3-100psi settable digital gauge
  • Micro has an auto shutoff at 72psi for hookless safety (NO GAUGE)
  • Accurate to 1% when used with the hose
  • Ultimate is the equivalent to 10 CO2 cartridges
  • Micro is equivalent to 4 CO2 cartridges
  • Carry-on Travel Safe
  • 25-60 minute charge time
  • 111g and 222g
  • 81 x 60 x 32 mm (Ultimate) and 65 x 46.5 x 28 mm (Micro)

The days of CO2 cartridges are officially over. The SILCA Elettrico MICRO packs the power of 4+ CO2 cartridges in a package about the size of an AirPods case. When you turn it on, be ready as drone motors engage within the aluminum box. With auto-cutoff at 72 psi (no gauge), it’s safe for use with hookless rims. A single 25-minute charge provides enough power to last for months, ensuring it always has your back. The Elettrico Micro is our on-bike inflation solution.

While the Elettrico ULTIMATE is ideal for destination gravel events or even as a floor pump replacement in your garage. Dialing in your tire pressure before a race or ride has never been easier with the 3-100 psi settable, auto cut off gauge. With certain tire and rim combination, we’ve had luck setting up tubeless tires, too.

  • CO2 Performance Without the Waste – Eliminate disposable cartridges
  • Auto Shutoff for Hookless Rims – Protects modern tubeless setups
  • Air-Travel Safe – TSA-compliant for travel and destination rides and races.
  • USB-C Rechargeable – Fast-charging for reliable inflation.
  • Universal Chuck Compatibility – Works with SILCA Schradero & Hiro Chucks.

Check out more at Silca.
